data.name: FSX Steam Edition: Pilatus PC-9/A Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Developed by IRIS from the Royal Australian Air Force’s PC-9/A pilot manual, the Pilatus PC-9/A for FSX: Steam Edition offers a wealth of realistic detail along with accurate flight dynamics and systems operation.

Introduced in the mid-1980s, the PC-9 series has served with various air forces around the world and still operates with the RAAF as a training aircraft. The airframe is versatile and capable of a wide variety of tasks from pilot training to aerobatic displays.

Features:

  • Faithfully recreated gauges accurate to the PC-9/A flown by the Royal Australian Air Force
  • Realistic flight model crafted and approved by former PC-9/A instructors
  • An easy-to-use, high resolution paint kit
  • Custom sound pack built from authentic PC-9/A audio from both inside the cockpit and the exterior of the aircraft
  • Custom displays and detailed on-board systems based on PC-9/A flight manuals designed for procedural training
  • Realistic flight models built from real world PC-9/A performance charts and tested by pilots with experience on the aircraft
  • Realistic material reflection and shine
  • Volumetric propeller effect
  • Authentic manual and documentation to provide the most realistic procedural simulation possible

data.short_description: Developed by IRIS from the Royal Australian Air Force’s PC-9/A pilot manual, the Pilatus PC-9/A for FSX: Steam Edition offers a wealth of realistic detail along with accurate flight dynamics and systems operation.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features
